    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="es">Pentágono regular áureo</string>
            <string language="en">The golden ratio and the pentagon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das goldene Verhältnis und das Pentagon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le taux d'or et le pentagone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A relação dourada e o pentagon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto dorato ed il pentagono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρυσή αναλογία και το Πεντάγωνο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">"simulaciones interactivas que muestran un pentágono y sus proporciones entre lados; y un rompecabezas con las piezas del pentágono"</string>
            <string language="en">"interactive simulations which show a pentagon and the ratio of its sides; and a jigsaw with pieces of the pentagon"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">áurea</string>
            <string language="en">golden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">razón</string>
            <string language="en">ratio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pentágono</string>
            <string language="en">pentagon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporción</string>
            <string language="en">proportion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"interaktive Simulationen, die ein Pentagon und 
das Verhältnis seiner Seiten zeigen; und eine Tischlerbandsäge
mit Stücken des Pentagons "</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"simulations interactives qui montrent un 
pentagone et le taux de ses côtés ; et une scie sauteuse avec 
des morceaux du pentagone "</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"simulações interativas que mostram um pentagon 
e a relação de seus lados; e um jigsaw com partes do pentagon 
"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"simulazioni interattive che mostrano un pentagono
ed il rapporto dei relativi lati; e un jigsaw con le parti del 
pentagono "</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"διαλογικές προσομοιώσεις που εμφανίζουν ένα 
Πεντάγωνο και την αναλογία των πλευρών της  και ένα 
τορνευτικό πριόνι με τα κομμάτια του Πενταγώνου "</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">golden</string>
          </keyword>
